summary: Completed comprehensive testing of iteration 3 - all major features working perfectly. Backend API 100% operational, frontend with new guide pages and chatbot v3.0 functioning correctly, mobile responsive design with overflow fixes implemented successfully.
passed_tests: All API endpoints (newsletter, contact, stats, CORS)
Homepage loads with hero section and 5 guide cards
Hero Tier List 2026 and Trap Workshop pages with NEW tags
ChatBot v3.0 client-side knowledge base functionality
ChatBot responds to hero queries (Pioneer Crusader, Skender)
ChatBot responds to military expedition queries
New Hero Tier List page with Element System and God Tier heroes
New Trap Workshop page with trap types table (Boulder, Stone Tower, Spike, Log, Arrow Tower, Caltrop)
Mobile responsiveness at 375px with overflow fixes
Newsletter form with localStorage fallback for GitHub Pages
Pocket Conquest mobile overflow fixes working
All navigation and footer links functional
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 API test suites passed), Frontend: 100% (all required features operational)
